thread.title: thomas knoll
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by thomas knoll

author: thomas knoll
title: thomas knoll
text: These guys (and girls) are soooo helpful, they will help even with technical issues and if you don't know what is happening, they will walk you through it. I've been with the company for years now, but will definitely stay with them forever :) My specific rep was Steven W in the technical support chat.
